sentence.Network_en: Trains start at 11.00 and an hourly service will operate until 16.00.
sentence.Network_cn: 火车11点开始发出，每小时一班，一直运营到16点。

sentence.Network_en: He flipped on the radio to get the hourly news broadcast.
sentence.Network_cn: 他打开收音机收听整点新闻。

sentence.Network_en: Hourly output by workers declined 1.3% in the first quarter.
sentence.Network_cn: 第一季度工人每小时的产量下降了1.3%。

entry.tran: 每小时一次的;每小时的
entry.def: An hourly event happens once every hour.

example.ex: He flipped on the radio to get the hourly news broadcast.
example.tran: 他打开收音机收听整点新闻。

entry.def: Your hourly earnings are the money that you earn in one hour.

example.ex: They have little prospect of finding new jobs with the same hourly pay.
example.tran: 他们不太可能找到时薪和原来一样的新工作。

means.word_mean: 每一小时的;每小时一次的〔地〕、按钟点计算的

sentences.en: Our charges are calculated by reference to an hourly rate.
